column3: â€œThe strain looks like it is inside out and the nuggets are a good solid with little to no dust, flakes, and stems. the quality of it is relaxing, energetic, creative, positive, motivating, strong pain relief, huge stress reducer, dramatically low anxiety and no paranoia, with strong optimistic traits. the smell (to me) is a strawberry/honey/earth.
